channel.title: Academics on Simon Que
channel.description: Recent content in Academics on Simon Que

item.title: Academics
item.description:
• Senior High School

    • De La Salle University Manila - Integrated School (2017-2019)
    • STEM Academic Track
    • Silver Award
    • Thesis research topic: “A Comparison Study Between Dual Stationary Photovoltaic Panels and Single-Axis Solar Tracking Photovoltaic Panel Power Systems in Maximum Power Point Tracking”
    • 2019 DLSU Research Congress Presenter

  • Undergraduate

    • De La Salle University Manila (2019-2023)
    • B.S. Computer Science Major in Computer Systems Engineering (CSE)
    • Magna Cum Laude
    • 3.697 GPA
    • Thesis research topic: “Semi-Automated Plant Growth Monitoring System (PGMS) for Cherry Tomatoes”
    • Most Outstanding Thesis Award - Gold
    • Additional published paper: “DLSU-Intelligent Biological and Agricultural Systems (BLAST)”
      • worked on the hardware and IoT data collection system

  • Graduate
